Html:
Hi,

I have a WPF application using PRISM and I would to know where can I find a true example of application using a Login and/or MessageBoxes.

I presume that to be commited to the MVVM pattern I must use the InteractionRequestTrigger but I could not find a real example of InteractionRequest using WPF to show a popup window with a Usercontrol in it.

Can you indicate a place to find and example of WPF Apllication activating a Popup Window with, for example, a login and password usercontrol.

Thanks in advance

Hi,

I believe you could find the following blog post useful, which provides a sample using a custom PopupWindowAction that can show a user control in it, in response to an InteractionRequest:
  • PopupWindowAction: using custom views instead of windows in WPF and Prism
I hope you find it useful,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
